mapper.sql: select id, students_id, result, absent_flag, create_date, update_date, del_flag, result_id from school_result_detail
mapper.select: select srd.*, s.students_name as 'name', YEAR(NOW())-YEAR(s.admission_time) as 'grade', c.nameclass as 'class' from school_result_detail srd left join schoolstudentslist s on s.id = srd.students_id left join school_class c on c.id = s.class_id where 1=1 and srd.result_id = #{id} and s.id is not null and (srd.result < 60 or srd.absent_flag =1 or srd.result is null)
